ValidationRule.description: An opportunity can only be closed-won when it has met all of the following requirements: - Payment Status = Paid - Payment Link <> null
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( IsWon, ISCHANGED(StageName),
OR( TEXT( Payment_Status__c ) <> "Paid", ISBLANK( Payment_Link_URL__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Complete the payment process and ensure the payment status is "Paid" before moving this opportunity to Closed-Won.
